Name: Vulkan: Lost Planet
About the game: Choose between 5 weapons cards, Upgrade your abilities in this insane top-down shooter! ABOUT THE GAME Arriving at the Lost Planet, Vulkan is surrounded by an variety of hostile creatures in his last mission as an intergalactic bounty-hunter. KEY FEATURES - Six weapons each one with unique abilities. - Upgrade your character to increase your chances of surviving. - Hardcore gameplay packed with action - Enemies A.I will go hard on you every time you kill more of them - Unique Hand-drawn characters and backgrounds
